attributes.action: Stop MPs using discredited statistics when promoting cycle helmet laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every MP who has recently proposed a cycle helmet law has claimed they would prevent 85% of head injuries. This number has no basis in fact, yet continues to be used as if it were true. This practice should be stopped.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
